Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

- On loading, you see the home page that has the current weather, three day forecast and map of a certain location. You can flip through the locations by pressing the next and previous buttons and the information will change accordingly

 - You can see more about current weather by pressing the see more button in that section. The three day weather forecast works the same

 - The locations are New York, Bangladesh, Glasgow, Mauritius, Oman and Bangladesh. Theses are where GCU has its campuses

 - There is a side menu that you can access by clicking the icon on the top left

 - The menu has the options for home, settings, help, notifications and exit

 - Pressing exit brings a pop up that lets you confirm your choice

 - In the settings, the user can pick dark or light mode as well as when to refresh the app
